experience.description: Job consisting of working individually, but also working in teams. Customer assistance requires one's ability to understand what they are looking for.
Work could be mentally demanding, because of the technichal aspects. Problem solvning and logical thinking, was important.

Worked at different departments at IKEA, which meant a lot of knowledge aquirement and knowledge sharing. Keeping track of things, having structure and being able to prioritize was important, because of the daily big quantities of restock/shortages/errors in stock. Being stress resistant, was also needed. Had responsibility of stocks.
I was also a specialist here. The job entailed overseeing sales numbers.
